bib.title: Fact-checking: relevance assessment of references in the Polish political domain
bib.author: Sawczyn, Albert and Binkowski, Jakub and Janiak, Denis and Augustyniak, {\L}ukasz and Kajdanowicz, Tomasz
bib.abstract: The prevalence of fake news could be observed in circumstances of emotion-causing events, like elections or pandemics. In fear of the potential impact, many fact-checking organisations were established. However, fact-checking requires a large amount of human labor, and hence there is a strong demand for complete automation of this process. Nevertheless, this milestone has not been achieved yet, even for English. The problem grows for the less popular languages that suffer from a scarcity of available resources. To
